dct_title_s: Diversi globi terr-aquei statione variante et visu intercedente, per coluros tropicorum, per ambos polos et particul. sphæræ zenith in planum delineati orthographici prospectus; quibus additæ, pro mutatione horizontis differentes sphæræ positiones earumque. Mutua cum circ. cœslestib. convenientia et relatio
dct_description_sm: Date of publication from Tooley. Relief shown pictorially. Double hemispherical map, with central hemispheres surrounded by eight smaller projections depicting world from various angles, and four smaller circular diagrams. From: Atlas minor ... Aug. Vind. [Augsburg] : Tobias Conrad Lotter, [1740]
